text: Moses Osirizir Arazibar aven, e pura guizɨn bizir gɨn otivamibar ababaniba ko nedazibar gari. Ezɨ a guizbangɨn deravɨra bizir kabar en akazir puvatɨ. Moses Osirizir Araziba ghaze, me ofan kamaghɨn garibara, zurara azeniba bar dar amu. Kamaghɨn amizɨ e fo, gumazamizir Godɨn boroghɨn zuiba, Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn mangɨ ofan kabar amigh, eghtɨ ofan kaba me akɨrightɨ me deraghvɨram otoghan kogham. Puvatɨ.
